Data Retrievers

class dasftoolbox.data_retrievers.data_retriever.DataWindowParameters(window_length: int, nb_window_reuse: int = 1, sliding_window_offset: int | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Class storing the parameters defining a window of data.

Variables:

  • window_length (int) – Length of the window of data.

  • nb_window_reuse (int) – Number of times each window of data is reused.

  • sliding_window_offset (int | None) – Offset of the sliding window. If None, it is set to the window length.

window_length: int
nb_window_reuse: int = 1
sliding_window_offset: int | None = None
get_window_sample_interval(window_id: int) → Tuple[int, int][source]
dasftoolbox.data_retrievers.data_retriever.get_stationary_setting(window_length: int, iterations: int) → DataWindowParameters[source]

Get the parameters to simulate a stationary setting by setting the sliding window offset to 0.

Parameters:

  • window_length (int) – Length of the window of data.

  • iterations (int) – Number of iterations desired for the simulation.

Returns:

Parameters to simulate a stationary setting.

Return type:

DataWindowParameters

class dasftoolbox.data_retrievers.data_retriever.DataRetriever(data_window_params: DataWindowParameters, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: object

Base class for data retrievers in the DASF format.

Variables:

data_window_params (DataWindowParameters) – Parameters defining the window of data.
